mapper.sql: select bNum, bName, bTitle, bCategory, mId, bDate, bHit, bGood, bContent, bFile, bState, mIp, mTel, bPrice from Board
mapper.insert: insert into Board ( bNum, bName, bTitle, bCategory, mId, bDate, bHit, bGood, bContent, bFile, bState, mIp, mTel, bPrice ) values ( #{bNum}, #{bName}, #{bTitle}, #{bCategory}, #{mId}, #{bDate}, #{bHit}, #{bGood}, #{bContent}, #{bFile}, #{bState}, #{mIp}, #{mTel}, #{bPrice} )
mapper.update: update Board set bName = #{bName}, bTitle = #{bTitle}, bCategory = #{bCategory}, mId = #{mId}, bDate = #{bDate}, bHit = #{bHit}, bGood = #{bGood}, bContent = #{bContent}, bFile = #{bFile}, bState = #{bState}, mIp = #{mIp}, mTel = #{mTel}, bPrice = #{bPrice} where bNum = #{bNum}
